summary: JUST PLAY THE DAMN SONG - The greatest feeling you can get in crypto or the most satisfying feeling you can get in crypto is the PUMP. Let's say you ape hard and it moons, massive amount of money is rushing into your token, and that's what we call the PUMP. Your muscles get a really tight feeling like your body is going to explode any minute. Somebody blowing ETH straight into your wallet, it just BLOWS UP and it feels fantastic!
